Package org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.clc.cas

This package contains classes for handling contigs stored in CLC Bio's .cas file format.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CasAlignment  
    CasAlignmentRegion  
    CasAlignmentScore  
    CasColorSpaceAlignmentScore  
    CasContigPair  
    CasFileInfo
    CasFileInfo contains all the information known by a .cas file about a group of similar files.
    CasFileVisitor
    CasFileVisitor is a FileVisitor implementation for visiting CLC Bio's .cas assembly files.
    CasFileVisitor.CasVisitorCallback  
    CasFileVisitor.CasVisitorCallback.CasVisitorMemento
    FastaVisitorMemento is a marker interface that CasFileParser instances can use to "rewind" back to the position in its cas file in order to revisit portions of the cas file.
    CasGappedReferenceDataStore
    CasGappedReferenceDataStore is a NucleotideSequenceDataStore that stores the gapped reference sequences that were computed from a cas file along with a mapping from the internal cas file reference indexes to the actual reference ids from the input reference file.
    CasMatch  
    CasMatchVisitor  
    CasParser
    CasParser is an interface that will parse a CLC cas formatted structures and call the appropriate visit methods on the given CasFileVisitor.
    CasReferenceDescription
    CasContigDescription is an interface which explains details about a contig (reference).
    CasScoringScheme  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAlignedReadCasVisitor
    AbstractAlignedReadCasVisitor is a CasFileVisitor that handles iterating over the aligned reads in the cas file.
    AbstractCasFileVisitor
    AbstractCasFileVisitor is a CasFileVisitor implementation that implements each method with a default empty stub.
    AbstractReadCasVisitor
    A CasFileVisitor that handles iterating over the aligned reads in the cas file.
    CasAlignmentScoreBuilder  
    CasFileParser
    CasFileParser is a CasParser that can parse CLC .cas formated files that were created using either the legacy clc_ref_assemble_X programs or the newer clc_mapper program.
    CasFileVisitorAdapter
    CasFileVisitorAdapter is a CasFileVisitor that wraps another CasFileVisitor and delegates all visitXXX methods to the wrapped instance.
    CasGappedReferenceDataStoreBuilderVisitor
    CasGappedReferenceDataStoreBuilderVisitor is a CasFileVisitor that will create a CasGappedReferenceDataStore when it visits a .cas encoded file.
    CasMatchVisitorAdapter
    CasMatchVisitorAdapter is a CasMatchVisitor that wraps another CasMatchVisitor and delegates all visitXXX methods to the wrapped instance.
    CasUtil
    CasUtil is a utility class for dealing with the binary encodings inside a .cas file.
    PhaseChangeCasAlignmentRegion  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CasAlignmentRegionType  
    CasAlignmentType  
    CasScoreType  
    ReadFileType
    ReadFileType says what kind of the file type a set of reads is stored as.

Package org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.clc.cas Description

This package contains classes for handling contigs stored in CLC Bio's .cas file format.
Author:
dkatzel
